examples.example: 这件衣服虽然款式普通，但穿在你身上一点也不难看，反而显得很精神。

translate.english: Although the style of this dress is ordinary, it doesn't look ugly at all when you wear it. Instead, it looks very energetic.

examples.example: 不要因为一次失败就觉得自己难看，要相信未来会有更多美好在等着你。

translate.english: Don't feel bad about yourself just because of one failure, and believe that there will be more beautiful things waiting for you in the future.

examples.example: 即使这面墙的颜色有些难看，但经过我们的精心布置后，它也变得温馨起来。

translate.english: Even though the color of this wall is a bit ugly, after our careful arrangement, it also becomes warm.
